
 Seam for Apache Wicket Module
 3.0.0.Beta1

 What is it?
 ===========

 The Seam for Apache Wicket Module is focused on integration between the Apache
 Wicket web framework and CDI.

 Contents of distribution
 ========================

 artifacts/
 
    Provided libraries

 lib/

    Dependencies

 docs/

    API Docs and reference guide.

 examples/

    Seam for Apache Wicket examples
  
 Licensing
 =========

 This distribution, as a whole, is licensed under the terms of the Apache
 License, Version 2.0 (see apl.txt).

 Seam for Apache Wicket URLs
 ===========================

 Seam for Apache Wicket Module: http://sfwk.org/Seam3/Wicket
 Seam 3 Home Page:              http://sfwk.org/Seam3
 Downloads:                     http://sfwk.org/Seam3/DistributionDownloads
 Forums:                        http://sfwk.org/Community/Seam3Users
 Source Code:                   http://github.com/seam/wicket
 Issue Tracking:                http://issues.jboss.org/browse/SEAMWICKET

 Release Notes
 =============

 - Initial release as Seam 3 module
